# Attach File to Comment

# Description

Attaches a file to a specific comment.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Sheet - The ID of the sheet. Click the icon to browse your Smartsheet files. This field supports String type input.
* Comment ID - The ID of the comment to which the attachment should be added. This field supports String type input.
* File - Click to use a variable and upload a file. This field supports IResource type input.





* Comment attachment - Automatically generated output variable.
